title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5012.6 - Removal of legal disability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5012.6 - Removal of legal disability

State Regulations

In the event that the legal disability is removed or a legal
representative is appointed and no claim is made for the monies, and after the
system has notified the individual or the legal representative of the existence
of the "beneficiary savings account" and the balance thereof, the monies shall
be treated in accordance with the provisions of section
531
of the

Education Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5012.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
